name: office
description: Generate Office documents (DOCX, XLSX, PDF) with TypeScript. Pure JS libraries that work everywhere: Claude Code CLI, Cloudflare Workers, browsers. Uses docx (Word), xlsx/SheetJS (Excel), pdf-lib (PDF). Use when: creating invoices, reports, spreadsheets, form filling, exporting data to Office formats, or troubleshooting Packer.toBuffer, XLSX.utils, PDFDocument errors.
